stimulusHtml: The experiences of soldiers such as those shown in the photograph most likely contributed to which of the following developments after 1918 ?

features.html:
INDIAN MUSLIM TROOPS IN THE BRITISH ARMED FORCES PRAYING. PHOTOGRAPH TAKEN IN SURREY, ENGLAND, 1916

FPG / Staff

 

In the background, a group of British civilians, mostly women, are watching the troops pray.

choicesHtml: Conflict between Hindus and Muslims in India
The rise of authoritarian governments between the world wars
The idea that all Muslims should unite politically under the Ottoman sultan
Growing anti-imperial opposition in European colonies such as India
